oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Statement from Highlander Folk School on Raid
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Statement of Highlander Folk School disputing the charges of those arrested on the night of the July 31, 1959, raid. The statement also alleged the Tennessee Attorney General used the raid as the only remaining means to close Highlander after previous attempts failed. The statement closed asking for support for Highlander and to attend an August 22 meeting.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Communism; Civil rights; Arrest; Governmental investigations; Race relations; School integration; Subversive activities; Police charges; Charters; Pre-trial procedure; Witnesses
